title: Council Decision of 27 March 1995 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Nursing Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 27 March 1995 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Nursing Training (95/C 83/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 77/454/EEC of 27 June 1977 setting up an Advisory Committee on Nursing Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, in its Decision of 25 July 1994 (2), the Council appointed Mr Colin RALPH a member of that Committee for the period ending 24 July 1997;
Whereas the United Kingdom Government has nominated Mrs Margaret WALLACE to replace Mr Colin RALPH,
main_body: Mrs Margaret WALLACE is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Nursing Training in place of Mr Colin RALPH for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 March 1995.
For the Council
The President
M. GIRAUD
(1) OJ No L 176, 15. 7. 1977, p. 11.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 3.
